Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies will host the Houston Astros for a three-game series from August 26-28, 2024.
Monday, August 26, will feature Star Wars™ Night, with fans encouraged to dress up as their favorite Star Wars™ characters.
USA Baseball Women’s National Team utility player Denae Benites will throw a ceremonial first pitch on August 26.
Tuesday, August 27, will be the 22nd annual Goya Latino Family Celebration, featuring music and entertainment to celebrate Latino culture.
Former NFL player Carl Nassib will throw a ceremonial first pitch on August 27 and will be a featured speaker in the Strike Out the Stigma event focusing on mental health in sports.
Wednesday, August 28, will feature Independence Blue Cross Senior Stroll the Bases for fans 55 and over after the game.
Former Philadelphia 76ers player and head coach Doug Collins will throw a ceremonial first pitch on August 28.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The band Dogs in a Pile will perform 'Take Me Out to the Ballgame' during the 7th inning stretch on August 28.
La Vera will offer its Famous Roast Pork Sandwich at Coca-Cola Corner for this series only.
Fans can bid on team-issued and game-used autographed memorabilia signed by former and current players as part of the Phillies Charities, Inc. Online Auction until September 1.
Others: Gate openings are at 5:10 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, and 2:35 p.m. on Wednesday.
Fans at Citizens Bank Park can enjoy the Phillies 94 WIP radio broadcast in real time using the MLB Ballpark app.
Go-Ahead Entry allows ticket holders to enter the ballpark at full walking speed without stopping.

All three games will be broadcast on NBCSP, nbcsportsphiladelphia.com, and the NBC Sports App. Monday’s game will also be available on FS1, Tuesday’s game on TBS (out-of-market only), and Wednesday’s game on MLB Network (out-of-market only).
Mobile ordering is available through the MLB Ballpark app for various food vendors.
Non-clear bags are prohibited; only clutch purses, clear bags, medical bags, and diaper bags are permitted.
Lot T is designated for Uber RideShare for all Citizens Bank Park and Wells Fargo Center events.
Parking for Phillies games is cashless, with pre-paid parking passes available for purchase.
Public transportation services are available; for a SEPTA schedule, visit www.septa.org.
Traffic conditions can be checked on www.511pa.com, www.511nj.org, or by calling 511.
